author: norman
msg: Handle unknown uid or msn ranges in Copy,Search,Store and Fetch commands (IMAP-209)

author: fdmanana
msg: 1) avoid badmatch exceptions when there's a failure opening a single document from a remote source;
2) add error log messages describing which remote documents couldn't be opened and why;
3) when replications errors can't be encoded as json, convert and send them as json strings
